detaileddescription.para: These routines exercise the algorithms outside of the exp code in order to check parameter choices, etc.
So far there is only one: it checks the spherical Sturm-Liouville basis

slcheck [mpi | cmap]
Reads the SLGridSph.model file and will prompt you for input parameters. The mpi flag runs the code using MPI and the cmap uses coordinate mapping based on the rs scale parameter.
